messages.message: Invalid colorModel in basic DFD block for BasisLZ supercompression.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_MODEL_BC4 but for BasisLZ supercompression it must be KHR_DF_MODEL_ETC1S.

messages.message: Invalid channelType for colorModel in basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #1 in basic DFD block specifies channel (0xF) which is not valid for color model KHR_DF_MODEL_BC4.
